urls.title: Leaky pipes can allow contaminants into our drinking water - Archive - News archive - The University of Sheffield
urls.description: This page was last edited on 08 June 2015 on an older version of our site and is no longer updated. It has been preserved for archive and research purposes. We cannot guarantee that this content is accurate. Some links and features may n o longer function. View the current University of Sheffield website Leaking water pipes can allow potentially harmf ul contaminants into our drinking water, new research has shown. The study, by engineers at the University of Sheffield, is the first to prove conclusively
